text: Spetters (English translation: Splashes) is a 1980 Dutch erotic drama movie directed by Paul Verhoeven and starring Hans van Tongeren, Renée Soutendijk, Jeroen Krabbé, Rutger Hauer, Kitty Courbois, Toon Agterberg, Maarten Spanjer, Marianne Boyer. ==Other websites== * * Category:1980 drama movies Category:1980s erotic movies Category:1980 LGBT movies Category:Dutch drama movies Category:Dutch LGBT movies Category:Movies directed by Paul Verhoeven
title: Spetters
